  • Constructor Details

    • Customer

      public Customer(String name, String surname, String userName, String password)
      creates a customer who will use the MyFoodora platform
      Parameters:
      name - : the name of the user
      surname - : the surname of the user
      userName - : the user name in the MyFoodora platform
      password - : the password of the user to login in the MyFoodora platform

    • Customer

      public Customer(String name, String surname, String userName, String password, Location address, String email, String phoneNumber)
      creates a customer who will use the MyFoodora platform
      Parameters:
      name - : the name of the user
      surname - : the surname of the user
      userName - : the user name in the MyFoodora platform
      password - : the password of the user to login in the MyFoodora platform
      address - : the address of the user
      email - : the email of the user
      phoneNumber - : the phone number of the user

    • registerFidelityCard

      public void registerFidelityCard(String cardType)
      registers the user to a Fidelity Card Plan of a given type : BasicFidelityCard, PointFidelityCard, LotteryFidelityCard or Null to unregister
      Parameters:
      cardType - : "basic", "point", "lottery" or "none" to unregister

    • displayFidelityInfo

      public void displayFidelityInfo()
      displays the informations of the user's fidelity card plan

    • getHistoryOfOrders

      public ArrayList<Order> getHistoryOfOrders(MyFoodora myFoodora)
      gets the history of all the orders the customer made on MyFoodora
      Parameters:
      myFoodora - : the MyFoodora core
      Returns:
      historyOfOrders : all the orders the customer made on MyFoodora

    • addOrder

      public void addOrder(Order order, boolean applyReduction, MyFoodora myFoodora)
      submits the completed order to myFoodora
      Parameters:
      order - : the completed order
      applyReduction - : "true" if the customer wants to apply a reduction using his fidelity card
      myFoodora - : MyFoodora core

    • payOrder

      public void payOrder(Order order)
      the client pays the order (the payment is not implemented in the project)
      Parameters:
      order - : the submitted order to pay
